docs.text: Welcome Sprint 1: Project Setup and Basic Structure Project repository created and version control set up (e.g., Git). Development environment configured with necessary tools and libraries. Installed Node.js and npm via https://nodejs.org/en/ and verified by typing node -v and npm -v in the terminal. Installed React and React-Router via npm install react react-dom react-router-dom and verified the installation by creating a new app by typing npx create-react-app new_app , cd new_app , and npm start in the terminal. Installed MySQL Community Server via https://www.mysql.com/downloads/. Initial verification via mysql -V failed and I had to add a path variable via vim ~/.zshrc , export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/mysql/bin/ . My initial installation failed. I removed all Installed Flask, Flask-SQLAlchemy, and Flask-CORS via pip3 install Flask Flask-SQLAlchemy Flask-CORS and verified the installation by creating a new directory mkdir flask_test_app , cd flask_test_app , and vim app.py . In app.py I wrote from flask import Flask from flask_sqlalchemy import SQLAlchemy from flask_cors import CORS import pymysql app = Flask(__name__) CORS(app) app.config['SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI'] = 'mysql+pymysql://user_name:password@localhost/db_name' app.config['SQLALCHEMY_TRACK_MODIFICATIONS'] = False db = SQLAlchemy(app) @app.route("/") def home(): return "Hello World" if __name__ == "__main__": app.run(debug=True) Basic structure and layout of the web application created using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Simple static movie list for testing purposes integrated.
docs.title: Welcome
